content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to browse https://www.alltrails.com/ for notable features of a hiking trail, but received a server error. The error message suggested to retry or contact the help center at help.openai.com.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "ping -c 3 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import urllib.request\\n\\ntry:\\n    urllib.request.urlopen(\'https://www.google.com\')\\n    print(\'Internet connection is working.\')\\nexcept:\\n    print(\'Internet connection is not working.\')", "name": "internet_connection.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Internet connection is working.\n', type='action_result')]
"""
